item.title: How to Uninstall Windows Update Which Install Failed
item.author: Author
item.description: How to uninstlal windows update which install failed Uninstall failed windows update Reboot your pc or laptop and select troubleshoot Select to open the command prompt and stay away from any other auto repair options. Loading the software rigistry. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #Load the softeware registry hive as follows. reg load hklm/temp c:\windows\system32\config\software #Delete the sessionPending registry key, if it exists by running: reg delete "HKLM\temp\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Component Based Servicing\SessionPending" /v Exclusive # Unload the software registry hive: reg unload HKLM\temp Remove failed updates with DISM command List failed updated.
